column4: hi everybody, i have an ipod touch and i have tried banshee and rhythmbox to try to move music on the device but it doesn't seem to list the device in any of those apps but the device icon is shown on the desktop and i'm able to browse it, any thoughts?
to migrate your music to an ipod, you can just use nautilus or a shell.
it mounts as a regular usb storage device.
yes, it mounts as a usb drive
